flawed_nl_solution:
There are 250/25 = <<250/25=10>>10 bundles of potatoes.
So, 10 bundles of potatoes amount to $1.9 x 10 = $19.
There are 320/20 = <<320/20=16>>16 bundles of carrots.
So, 16 bundles of carrots amount to $2 x 16 = $23.
Hence, the farmer got $19 + $23 = $<<19+23=42>>42 in all.
#### 42

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 32, not 23. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
